commit.message: Add .vs directory to .gitignore and remove slnx.sqlite file
Add .vs directory to .gitignore and remove slnx.sqlite file
Refactor URL construction for document view redirection in index.html
Refactor URL construction for document view redirection in index.html

Fix: Enhanced client-side routing for Azure App Service 404 issues

- Improved index.html routing to properly convert /doc/ URLs to file parameters
- Added path-to-file conversion logic for proper document routing
- Enhanced debugging and console logging for troubleshooting

This should resolve the nginx 404 issues by handling routing client-side
before requests reach the problematic Azure App Service nginx config.

Fix: Enhanced client-side routing for Azure App Service 404 issues

- Improved index.html routing to properly convert /doc/ URLs to file parameters
- Added path-to-file conversion logic for proper document routing
- Enhanced debugging and console logging for troubleshooting

This should resolve the nginx 404 issues by handling routing client-side
before requests reach the problematic Azure App Service nginx config.
Add versioning system with automated build information; update Azure pipeline and configuration files
Add versioning system with automated build information; update Azure pipeline and configuration files

files.patch:
@@ -1,11 +1,5 @@
 # PHP as Linux Web App on Azure
-# Build, package and deploy your PHP project to Azure Linux Web A                      # Configure the router as startup file and set routing mode
-                      az webapp config set \
-                        --name $(webAppName) \
-                        --resource-group rg-controlorigins-docs \
-                        --startup-file "router.php" \
-                        --linux-fx-version "PHP|8.4" Add steps that run tests and more:
-# https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/devops/pipelines/languages/php
+# Build, package and deploy your PHP project to Azure Linux Web App
 
 trigger:
   - main
@@ -46,6 +40,12 @@ stages:
             workingDirectory: $(rootFolder)
             displayName: 'Use PHP version $(phpVersion)'
 
+          - script: |
+              echo "Updating version information..."
+              node scripts/update-version.js
+            workingDirectory: $(rootFolder)
+            displayName: 'Update Version File'
+
           - script: composer install --no-interaction --prefer-dist
             workingDirectory: $(rootFolder)
             displayName: 'Composer install'
@@ -80,6 +80,7 @@ stages:
                   displayName: 'Deploy Azure Web App : controlorigins-docs'
                   inputs:
                     azureSubscription: $(azureSubscription)
+                    appType: 'webAppLinux'
                     appName: $(webAppName)
                     package: $(Pipeline.Workspace)/drop/$(Build.BuildId).zip
 
@@ -93,7 +94,7 @@ stages:
                     scriptLocation: 'inlineScript'
                     inlineScript: |
                       echo "Configuring App Service settings..."
-                      
+
                       # Enable URL rewriting and configure PHP settings
                       az webapp config appsettings set \
                         --name $(webAppName) \
@@ -118,5 +119,5 @@ stages:
                         --name $(webAppName) \
                         --resource-group rg-controlorigins-docs \
                         || echo "Failed to restart app"
-                      
+
                       echo "Configuration completed"

@@ -1,13 +1,14 @@
 {
   "name": "documents",
-  "version": "1.0.0",
+  "version": "1.2.0",
   "description": "PHPDocSpark documentation platform by Mark Hazleton",
   "main": "index.js",
   "engines": {
     "node": ">=18.0.0",
     "npm": ">=8.0.0"
   },
   "scripts": {
+    "update-version": "node scripts/update-version.js",
     "dev": "vite build --watch",
     "dev:serve": "concurrently \"npm run dev\" \"npm run serve\"",
     "build": "node scripts/build.js",

@@ -106,6 +106,11 @@

commit.message: Enhance JavaScript routing in index.html for better URL handling; update Parsedown.php method signatures to support nullable parameters
Enhance JavaScript routing in index.html for better URL handling; update Parsedown.php method signatures to support nullable parameters
